original_title: THE IDOLM@STER ニューイヤーライブ!! 初星宴舞
overview: THE IDOLM@STER New Year Live!! Hatsuboshi Enbu LIVE Blu-ray is a Blu-ray release of the titular live concert event that took place at the Makuhari Messe Event Hall in Chiba, Japan on January 8 and 9, 2018.
title: THE IDOLM@STER New Year Live!! Hatsuboshi Enbu
